description: This file defines a React functional component for a Confluence Spaces webpage, allowing users to search and create Confluence spaces via an API invocation. It manages UI state, handles user input, and interacts with external tools through API calls.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Asynchronously calls the 'search_spaces' tool with provided tenant and connector IDs, query, and updates the result or error state.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Asynchronously calls the 'create_space' tool with provided tenant and connector IDs, and name query, then updates the result or error state.
